lead_paragraph: NBC announcer Al Trautwig said Monday he regrets tweeting that the adoptive mother and father of American gymnastics star Simone Biles were not her parents, a declaration that angered advocates for adoption.

headline.print_headline: NBC Announcer Says He Regrets Tweet About Biles' Parents
headline.main: NBC Announcer Says He Regrets Tweet About Biles' Parents
